metadata.title: CVE-2023-52875 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: clk:mediatek: clk-mt2701: Add check for mtk_alloc_clk_data Add the check forthe return value of mtk_alloc_clk_data() in order to avoid NULL pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
